short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension for Veracross student clients.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A Chrome extension for the students who use Veracross.
The extension can automatically reload the Veracross page, check the grades' updates, and notify the users. It can calculate the total GPA and show the GPA for each class, but because I get the data from my high school website, it may not be correct in other schools.
I only test the extension via my account, so if you find any bugs/problems, please contact me.
